description.narrative: Milab aims to support transformative changes in the organizational and innovation culture in the public and private sectors

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative:
Output 1. 1. No. of explore and horizon scanning exercises to use DT, ST, other (national and regional) 2. Number of co-designed experiments with external partners (national and regional) 3. Number of successfully implemented experiments and proposed policy options (ready for up-scale, national and regional)
Output 2 1. No. of internally co-designed and implemented experiments in partnership with UN/UNDP 2. No. of supported projects which now use different/innovative approached in project delivery
Output 3 1. No. of capacity building sessions for staff of the Innovation Lab 2. No. of learning events annually organized by staff of the Lab for other UNDP country offices (including AccLabs) and partners 3. No. of support initiatives to build capacities in other COs and promote collaborative innovation and experimentation work 4. No of other COs and UN sister agencies connected to various UNDP Moldova initiatives and cost-sharing experimentation work; 5. No. of services provided to other COs.

comment.narrative: - Limited transformational and innovational culture in the public and private sectors for accelerating achievement of the SDGs and National Targets. - No active think tanks aimed at testing new solutions for streamlining innovations - Limited available desegregated official statistics data to ensure human centered policy making and targeted development interventions
